mapper.select:
SELECT c.challenge_id AS challengeId, c.title, c.description, c.starts_at AS startDate, c.ends_at AS endDate, c.status AS status,
/* 상태별 참여자 수 */ CASE WHEN c.status IN ('UPCOMING', 'ACTIVE') THEN ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM challenge_participants cp WHERE cp.challenge_id = c.challenge_id AND cp.status = 'JOINED' )
WHEN c.status = 'ENDED' THEN ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM challenge_participants cp WHERE cp.challenge_id = c.challenge_id AND cp.status IN ('COMPLETED', 'FAILED') )
WHEN c.status = 'CLOSED' THEN ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM challenge_participants cp WHERE cp.challenge_id = c.challenge_id AND cp.status = 'REFUNDED' )
ELSE 0 END AS participantCount,
/* 현재 사용자 참여 여부 */ CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM challenge_participants cp2 WHERE cp2.challenge_id = c.challenge_id AND cp2.user_id = #{userId} AND ( (c.status IN ('UPCOMING','ACTIVE') AND cp2.status = 'JOINED') OR (c.status = 'ENDED' AND cp2.status IN ('COMPLETED','FAILED')) OR (c.status = 'CLOSED' AND cp2.status = 'REFUNDED') ) ) THEN true ELSE false END AS joined
FROM challenges c ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO challenges (title, description, budget_limit, period_days, starts_at, ends_at, status, user_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{budgetLimit}, #{periodDays}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, 'UPCOMING', #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE challenges SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, starts_at = #{startDate}, ends_at = #{endDate}, period_days = #{periodDays}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE challenge_id = #{challengeId}
UPDATE challenges SET status = 'CLOSED', updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE challenge_id = #{challengeId}
mapper.select: SELECT challenge_id FROM challenges WHERE ends_at <= #{currentTime} AND status != 'CLOSED'
mapper.update: UPDATE challenges SET status = CASE WHEN CURDATE() < DATE(starts_at) THEN 'UPCOMING' WHEN CURDATE() > DATE(ends_at) THEN 'ENDED' ELSE 'ACTIVE' END WHERE status != 'CLOSED'
